quote.msg: 點解佢地D醫院可以唔收病人

replies.msg:
佢唔係唔收病人
而係佢認定咗武漢肺炎有三個stage

第一個stage 係incubation period
第二個stage 係發燒個啲symptoms
係第二個stage個啲要留係屋企, 點解係屋企?
因為醫院一定會爆, 係呢個stage 嘅時候醫生都唔會幫到你
因為無藥醫, 最多咪開退消藥比你
你去醫院反而霸住咗個床位

第三個stage 係肺炎, 大約20-30%人會黎到呢個stage
去到呢個stage 你先開始自己搞唔掂
所以呢個時候醫院就會收你入去

咁樣就對醫院最好
好多中國人中意一發燒就屌柒醫生做咩唔醫好佢
日日去醫院嘈
如果英國醫院個個都收, 一早爆咗煲啦

replies.msg:
同問
利申:我兩個禮拜後走

Boris Johnson has just announced a raft of restrictions people in the UK are being urged to follow.

From tonight, people will be allowed to leave their homes for:

shopping for basic necessities, as infrequently as possible
one form of exercise a day - for example a run, walk, or cycle, alone or with members of their household;
any medical need, to provide care or to help a vulnerable person;
travelling to and from work, but only where it is absolutely necessary and cannot be done from home
This is not a lockdown, but it's as close as you can get to one without it being called a lockdown.
係咪即係戒嚴？

quote.msg:
Boris Johnson has just announced a raft of restrictions people in the UK are being urged to follow.

From tonight, people will be allowed to leave their homes for:

shopping for basic necessities, as infrequently as possible
one form of exercise a day - for example a run, walk, or cycle, alone or with members of their household;
any medical need, to provide care or to help a vulnerable person;
travelling to and from work, but only where it is absolutely necessary and cannot be done from home
This is not a lockdown, but it's as close as you can get to one without it being called a lockdown.

replies.msg: 唔算啦，仲可以出門口買野返工

From tonight, people in Britain will be allowed to leave their homes for only “very limited purposes” - shopping for basic necessities; for one form of exercise a day; for any medical need; and to travel to and from work when “absolutely necessary”

People are warned not to meet friends or family members who they do not live with
Shopping is only permitted for essentials like food and medicine, and people are advised to do it “as little as you can”

Police have powers to enforce the rules, including through fines and dispersing gatherings
All shops selling non-essential goods, such as clothing and electronic stores, are ordered to close
Libraries, playgrounds, outdoor gyms and places of worship are to close

All gatherings of more than two people in public - excluding people you live with - are banned
All social events, including weddings and baptisms are banned

Funerals are not included in the new restrictions
Parks will remain open for exercise but gatherings will be dispersed

Restrictions “under constant review” and will be checked again in three weeks. They will be relaxed “if the evidence shows we are able to”

係香港縱慣左班人感冒發下燒皮膚痕頭痛失呡都睇急症
人地不嬲感冒發燒都係自己睇配粒藥訓教飲水，連gp 都慳番
當然今次係肺炎嚴重過流感，但如果香港千千聲咁爆，你估醫院仲接收到，可能都係叫未上肺果d 返屋企抖
別看得咁高，人性都係一樣的...
香港醫生一早講咗而家係會收你，但一旦擋唔住大爆發就會好似歐洲咁在家隔離，所以先係咁叫你減少社交，唔想大爆發迫到班病人自生自滅，香港可以咁做係因為擋到第一波爆發，英國係一開始就直跳去爆發期，根本就係前期防禦唔好先會咁

replies.msg:
係呀
英國唔止係防禦唔好，直情係無防禦添

利申 現處London, 剛封城

quote.msg: 點解佢地D醫院可以唔收病人

佢唔係唔收病人
而係佢認定咗武漢肺炎有三個stage

第一個stage 係incubation period
第二個stage 係發燒個啲symptoms
係第二個stage個啲要留係屋企, 點解係屋企?
因為醫院一定會爆, 係呢個stage 嘅時候醫生都唔會幫到你
因為無藥醫, 最多咪開退消藥比你
你去醫院反而霸住咗個床位

第三個stage 係肺炎, 大約20-30%人會黎到呢個stage
去到呢個stage 你先開始自己搞唔掂
所以呢個時候醫院就會收你入去

咁樣就對醫院最好
好多中國人中意一發燒就屌柒醫生做咩唔醫好佢
日日去醫院嘈
如果英國醫院個個都收, 一早爆咗煲啦

replies.msg:
如果隻病毒傳染力低...呢個係好既做法

但放哂d 人番屋企隔離，以武漢肺炎黎講只會加速社區爆發既風險喎......就算假設佢乖乖地留係屋企，佢接觸過既人一樣會係社會上周圍走。 武漢中期未一樣趕哂d 人番屋企......結果呢

上面既處理方法係為左令醫療系統唔爆煲，而將病人推哂番社區......最大問題係忽略左病毒傳染力既問題，到最後一變四，到時仲更加處理唔到。
